protocol_name: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.
protocol_name_html: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.
description: From here, You can learn about the detail methods of genome assembly and gene annotation of the Betta splendens genome.

collections.protocol_name: High-quality reference genome of the Siamese fighting fish Betta splendens, a model species for the study of aggression
collections.protocol_name_html: High-quality reference genome of the Siamese fighting fish Betta splendens, a model species for the study of aggression

components.data: Quality Control
components.name: Section

components.data: Get raw sequencing data in Fastq format. Filter the raw sequencing data by using SOAPfilter (version 2.2).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Get raw sequencing data in Fastq format. Filter the raw sequencing data by using SOAPfilter (version 2.2).

components.data: Assembly
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Run SOAPdenovo (version 2.04 ) to assemble the Betta splendens genome.

 

2. Perform Gapcloser (version 1.12) to further close gaps in our genome obtained in step3.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Run SOAPdenovo (version 2.04 ) to assemble the Betta splendens genome.

 

2. Perform Gapcloser (version 1.12) to further close gaps in our genome obtained in step3.

source_data.annotation: 2-Note: using reads from all insert-size libraries
source_data.thread_text: 2-Note: using reads from all insert-size libraries
source_data.body: 2-Note: using reads from all insert-size libraries

components.data: Repeat annotation_de novo
components.name: Section

components.data:
1. Run RepeatModeler(1.0.8) and LTR_FINDER(1.0.6), respectively, to build de novo library based on the input assembled genome sequence.

 

2. Basing on the library constructed in step 5 as database, run RepeatMasker (version 3.3.0) to find and then classify the repetitive sequences.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Run RepeatModeler(1.0.8) and LTR_FINDER(1.0.6), respectively, to build de novo library based on the input assembled genome sequence.

 

2. Basing on the library constructed in step 5 as database, run RepeatMasker (version 3.3.0) to find and then classify the repetitive sequences.

components.data: Repeat annotation_homolog
components.name: Section

components.data: Run RepeatMasker and ProteinMask (version 3.3.0) to identify repeats in the genome at DNA and protein level, respectively, by aligning sequences against existing databases, Repbase TE library (Version 17.01) and TE protein database.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run RepeatMasker and ProteinMask (version 3.3.0) to identify repeats in the genome at DNA and protein level, respectively, by aligning sequences against existing databases, Repbase TE library (Version 17.01) and TE protein database.

source_data.protocol_name: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.
source_data.protocol_name_html: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.

components.data: Gene prediction_de novo
components.name: Section

components.data: Run Augustus (version 3.0.3) and GlimmerHMM (version 3.0.1) to de novo predict genes in the repeat-masked genome sequences.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run Augustus (version 3.0.3) and GlimmerHMM (version 3.0.1) to de novo predict genes in the repeat-masked genome sequences.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 6 of An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.
source_data.protocol_name: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.
source_data.protocol_name_html: An analytical pipeline of assembly and annotation of the Betta splendens genome.

components.data: Gene prediction_homolog
components.name: Section

components.data: Download protein sequences of homlog species (danio rerio(release-64), gadus morhua(release-65), gasterosteus aculeatus(release-64), oryzias latipes(release-64),  takifugu rubripes(release-64), and tetraodon nigroviridis(release-64)), then align these against our masked genome sequences with BLAT, and then based on the BLAT mapping results, run GeneWise (version 2.2.0 ) to predict genes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Download protein sequences of homlog species (danio rerio(release-64), gadus morhua(release-65), gasterosteus aculeatus(release-64), oryzias latipes(release-64),  takifugu rubripes(release-64), and tetraodon nigroviridis(release-64)), then align these against our masked genome sequences with BLAT, and then based on the BLAT mapping results, run GeneWise (version 2.2.0 ) to predict genes.

components.data: Gene prediction_glean
components.name: Section

components.data: Integrate genes predicted in step 8-9 to obtain the consensus gene set by using GLEAN.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Integrate genes predicted in step 8-9 to obtain the consensus gene set by using GLEAN.

components.data: Gene prediction_adding RNA-seq
components.name: Section

components.data: Perform TopHat (version 2.1.0) with default parameters to align filtered RNA-seq reads against gene set mentioned in Step10, and then use Cufflinks (version 2.2.1) to assemble these transcripts, then use training parameters to predict ORFs, and finally obtain the more intergrity and trusty gene set.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Perform TopHat (version 2.1.0) with default parameters to align filtered RNA-seq reads against gene set mentioned in Step10, and then use Cufflinks (version 2.2.1) to assemble these transcripts, then use training parameters to predict ORFs, and finally obtain the more intergrity and trusty gene set.

components.data: Estimation of completeness
components.name: Section

components.data: Run BUSCO(version 3.0.1) and map final gene set and genome to actinopterygii reference to assess the completeness.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Run BUSCO(version 3.0.1) and map final gene set and genome to actinopterygii reference to assess the completeness.
